name: Texan Music
description: Regional Music from the US state of Texas.

children.name: Acoustic Texas Blues
children.description: Laid-back swing rhythms and guitar ornamentation, including solos.

children.name: Electric Texas Blues
children.description: Originating in (but not limited to) Texas; includes Jazz influences like Swing rhythms and sometimes the addition of a horn section.

children.name: Tejano Music
children.description: Mexican-American style infusing the conjunto Norte√±o ensemble with European dances and American popular music.

children.name: Tex-Mex
children.description: Mixes Rock & Roll, Blues, Country, and several types of Hispanic American Music, particularly Tejano Music.
